root.name: Bratz: Rock Angelz
root.description: There are Bratz that you can control and play games with. You can shop and dress them up to your design. As the selection is mediocre. It is also fun for girls ranging from ages 3 to 15. There are many other options you can customize and make better. Overall this game has a great starter aspect but can never reach the heights that other games have reached in todays gaming world.
